block.p: American League BALTIMORE ORIOLES--Named Darrell Rogers director of minor league operations. BOSTON RED SOX--Claimed 1B-OF Kevin Millar off waivers from Florida. CLEVELAND INDIANS--Agreed to terms with OF Shane Spencer on a one-year contract.
National League MILWAUKEE BREWERS--Agreed to terms with RHP Todd Ritchie on a one-year contract. MONTREAL EXPOS--Agreed to terms with RHP Tony Armas, Jr., on a one-year contract.

American League BALTIMORE ORIOLES--Named Darrell Rogers director of minor league operations. BOSTON RED SOX--Claimed 1B-OF Kevin Millar off waivers from Florida. CLEVELAND INDIANS--Agreed to terms with OF Shane Spencer on a one-year contract.
National League MILWAUKEE BREWERS--Agreed to terms with RHP Todd Ritchie on a one-year contract. MONTREAL EXPOS--Agreed to terms with RHP Tony Armas, Jr., on a one-year contract.

National Football League CLEVELAND BROWNS--Named Clancy Pendergast linebackers coach. HOUSTON TEXANS--Signed OT Andy Stensrud, WR Derick Armstrong, TE Rashod Kent, DT Marcus Spriggs, OL Ed Ta'amu, S Travis Tillman, CB Darrick Vaughn and LB Terrell Washington to one-year contracts. JETS--Signed RB Raymonn Adams, RB Little John Flowers, G Brandon Moore and RB Johnathan Reese to the active roster.
